title: blucepheus
author: blucepheus
created_time: September 18, 2023, 02:14:04 AMLast edit: September 25, 2023, 01:03:06 AM by blucepheus
content: Bitcoin Magazine Issue 1!May 2012 - Own a piece of Bitcoin history!Graded high at 9.0 by CGC Retails for $2,100 (0.079 BTC) ungradedhttps://store.bitcoinmagazine.com/products/bitcoin-magazine-issue-1-may-2012STARTING BID: 0.01 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.005END TIME: SEPTEMBER 24, 2023, 18:00:00 Pacific Time**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bidPAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC to address provided to winner via PM right after auction end (I will not contact you on any other platform!)ESCROW: Minerjones, if desired (he will not contact you on any other platform!)SHIPPING: FREE in the U.S. via USPS Priority. International requires escrow through MJ, and shipping by him to final destination (you will cover shipping cost)Good luck!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: 0.05 BTCPretty steep bid increments. But for sure a great rating / condition for a #1 issue, nice to see an auction going.I never realized they were released in 2012, that's truely an early piece of Bitcoin history. Even before the 2013 hype and Mt. Gox fiasco.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: a very nice auction, which @blucepheus is holding for the second time in this way. the first one i was lucky enough to win in mid may this year  - at that time the graded scale was set to 8.5gl to every one

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on September 20, 2023, 06:00:35 AM0.052 btcMinimum bid increment is 0.005, do I hear 0.055?Kryptowerk is the current high bidder at 0.05.

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: 0.055 btc.   (My bad for not knowing the minimum bid, thank you for letting me know)

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on September 21, 2023, 04:38:07 AM0.055 btc.   (My bad for not knowing the minimum bid, thank you for letting me know)Absolutely. You’re the high bid now. Thank you!

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: It’s all yours Dinobit, too close to retail for me. Congrats Edit: plus I would rather buy one and read it before I had it slabbed, otherwise I’d always wonder what’s inside lol)
